channel.title: [RS2][DIVI][SRL] Drag's Draynor Netter (DDN)
channel.description:
[size=10pt][b]DRAG`S DRAYNOR NETTER! (DDN)[/b][/size] [size=10pt]Brought to you by: Drags Script Productions[/size]
{ , , / \ /\___/\ / \ | \ ( ) / | | | \ --\* */-- / | | |\| | \ / \_/ \ / | |/| | \ * * / | \ \ \ Drags111's / / / \ \ Scripts / / |\ \ / /| \ / \ /| |\ / \ / | | \ / \ / \ / [code]} ======================================= |=======================================| | ~Version .01~ | |Script Name: Drags Draynor Netter (DDN)| |Author: Drags111 | |What It Does: It will fish and bank | | shrimp and anchovies at draynor. | | does not bait fish. | | | |Requirements: ScarDIVI 3.06 and SRL 3.7| |RECOMMENDED!!! Have players that arn't | | going to be attacked by | | wizards!!!!!! | | | |Setup: Put characters in Draynor Bank | | in a bank slot and have a net | | in your inventory FIRST slot | | and nets in your bank NEAR THE | | TOP. | | Do Setup line 43 and Setup | | Players starting on line 54. | | | |POST ALL ERRORS ON SRL OR MSN ME AT | |Drags111@hotmail.com THANKS! | =======================================[/code]
[size=10pt]Current Version[/size] The current version is v.01!
[size=10pt]Future Updates[/size] v.02 Continue to Fix Beta Bugs. v.03 Cook Shrimp and eat when needed. v.04 Better AntiRandoms and AntiBan. v.05 AutoRespond(Possibly)
More Comming Soon...
[size=10pt]PLEASE POST BUGS OR CONTACT ME AT [email]Drags111@Hotmail.com[/email] THANKYOU![/size]
[size=10pt]Dont for get to RANK MY SCRIPT! :cool:[/size]
[size=10pt]Special Thanks!!![/size] Boreas - OMG THANKYOU!!! Sumilion - Thanks for all your help :)
[size=10pt]Download Link[/size]
http://www.srl-forums.com/forum/attachment.php?attachmentid=4487&d=1181662590 OR Attachment

item.title: [RS2][DIVI][SRL] Drag's Draynor Netter (DDN)
item.dc:creator: @drags111 drags111
item.description:
@drags111 wrote:

[size=10pt]DRAG`S DRAYNOR NETTER! (DDN)[/size]
[size=10pt]Brought to you by: Drags Script Productions[/size]

{ , ,
/ \ /___/\ /
| \ ( ) / |

\ /| |\ /
\ / | | \ /
\ / \ /

[code]}

|=======================================|
| ~Version .01~ |
|Script Name: Drags Draynor Netter (DDN)|
|Author: Drags111 |
|What It Does: It will fish and bank |
| shrimp and anchovies at draynor. |
| does not bait fish. |
| |
|Requirements: ScarDIVI 3.06 and SRL 3.7|
|RECOMMENDED!!! Have players that arn’t |
| going to be attacked by |
| wizards!!! |
| |
|Setup: Put characters in Draynor Bank |
| in a bank slot and have a net |
| in your inventory FIRST slot |
| and nets in your bank NEAR THE |
| TOP. |
| Do Setup line 43 and Setup |
| Players starting on line 54. |
| |
|POST ALL ERRORS ON SRL OR MSN ME AT |
|Drags111@hotmail.com THANKS! |
=======================================[/code]

[size=10pt]Current Version[/size]
The current version is v.01!

[size=10pt]Future Updates[/size]
v.02 Continue to Fix Beta Bugs.
v.03 Cook Shrimp and eat when needed.
v.04 Better AntiRandoms and AntiBan.
v.05 AutoRespond(Possibly)

More Comming Soon…

[size=10pt]PLEASE POST BUGS OR CONTACT ME AT Drags111@Hotmail.com THANKYOU![/size]
